span.span: The type of keys in the collection.
The type of items in the collection.

summary.span: 提供键嵌入在值中的集合的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides the abstract base class for a collection whose keys are embedded in the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该类同时提供 o (1) 索引的检索和 (1) 方法的键控检索。The class provides both O(1) indexed retrieval and keyed retrieval that approaches O(1). 它是抽象类型，或者更准确地说是一组无限抽象类型，因为其构造的泛型类型都是抽象基类。It is an abstract type, or more accurately an infinite set of abstract types, because each of its constructed generic types is an abstract base class. 若要使用 ，请从适当的构造类型中派生集合类型。To use , derive your collection type from the appropriate constructed type. 类是基于 泛型接口的集合和基于泛型接口的集合之间的混合 。The class is a hybrid between a collection based on the generic interface and a collection based on the generic interface. 类似于基于 泛型接口的集合， 是项的索引列表。Like collections based on the generic interface, is an indexed list of items. 与基于泛型接口的集合类似 ， 具有与每个元素相关联的键。Like collections based on the generic interface, has a key associated with each element. 与字典不同，的元素 不是键/值对，而是整个元素是值并且该键嵌入在值中。Unlike dictionaries, an element of is not a key/value pair; instead, the entire element is the value and the key is embedded within the value. 例如，派生自 `KeyedCollection\` Visual Basic) 中 (的集合的元素 `KeyedCollection(Of String, String)` 可能是 "John Doe Jr"。For example, an element of a collection derived from `KeyedCollection\` (`KeyedCollection(Of String, String)` in Visual Basic) might be "John Doe Jr." 其中，值为 "John Doe Jr"。where the value is "John Doe Jr." 密钥为 "Doe";或包含整数键的雇员记录的集合可以从派生 `KeyedCollection\` 。and the key is "Doe"; or a collection of employee records containing integer keys could be derived from `KeyedCollection\`. Abstract 方法从元素中提取键。The abstract method extracts the key from the element. 默认情况下， 包括一个可使用属性获取的查找字典 。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that you can obtain with the property. 向添加项后 ，该项的键将被提取一次并保存在查找字典中，以加快搜索速度。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 当你创建时，将通过指定字典创建阈值来重写此行为 。This behavior is overridden by specifying a dictionary creation threshold when you create the . 第一次元素数目超过该阈值时，会创建查找字典。The lookup dictionary is created the first time the number of elements exceeds that threshold. 如果指定-1 作为阈值，则永远不会创建查找字典。If you specify -1 as the threshold, the lookup dictionary is never created. > [!NOTE] > 当使用内部查找字典时，如果为引用类型，则包含对集合中所有项的引用; `TItem` 如果 `TItem` 是值类型，则包含集合中所有项的副本。When the internal lookup dictionary is used, it contains references to all the items in the collection if `TItem` is a reference type, or copies of all the items in the collection if `TItem` is a value type. 因此，如果是值类型，则使用查找字典可能不适合 `TItem` 。Thus, using the lookup dictionary may not be appropriate if `TItem` is a value type. 可以通过使用属性访问项的索引或键 。You can access an item by its index or key by using the property. 可以添加没有键的项，但随后只能通过索引访问这些项。You can add items without a key, but these items can subsequently be accessed only by index. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示从派生的最小代码 ，并演示了许多继承的方法。The first example shows the minimum code required to derive from , and demonstrates many of the inherited methods. 第二个示例演示如何重写的受保护方法 以提供自定义行为。The second example shows how to override the protected methods of to provide custom behavior. **示例 1****Example 1** 此代码示例演示从派生集合类所需的最少代码 ：重写 方法，并提供委托给基类构造函数的公共构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 此代码示例还演示了继承自和类的多个属性和方法 。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是一个非常简单的请求列表，其中 `OrderItem` 每个对象都表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 的键 `OrderItem` 是不可变的，它是派生自的类的重要注意事项 。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 、、 和 方法，以提供、和方法的自定义行为， 并 (c # 中的索引器 ) 设置默认属性。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是一个名为的通知事件 `Changed` ，它在每个重写的方法的末尾引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建 `SimpleOrder` 类，该类派生自 并表示一个简单的订单窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订单窗体包含 `OrderItem` 表示排序项的对象。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建了一个 `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` 包含事件信息的类，以及一个用于标识更改类型的枚举。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 此代码示例通过在类的方法中调用派生类的属性和方法，演示了自定义行为 `Main` `Demo` 。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的使用从获取的键类型的默认泛型相等比较器 。A created with this constructor uses the default generic equality comparer for the type of the key, obtained from . 若要指定不同的泛型相等比较器，请使用 构造函数或 构造函数。To specify a different generic equality comparer, use the constructor or the constructor. 默认情况下， 包括添加第一项时创建的查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 向添加项后 ，该项的键将被提取一次并保存在查找字典中，以加快搜索速度。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 可以使用 构造函数并指定字典创建阈值来重写此行为。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. > [!NOTE] > 因为 类 `MustInherit` 在 Visual Basic) 中是抽象的 (，所以必须从派生该类才能使用。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在派生类型的构造函数中，调用相应的 构造函数。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 不需要公开功能，如相等比较器或构造函数中的字典创建阈值。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 此代码示例演示从派生集合类所需的最少代码 ：重写 方法，并提供委托给基类构造函数的公共构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 此代码示例还演示了继承自和类的多个属性和方法 。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是一个非常简单的请求列表，其中 `OrderItem` 每个对象都表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 的键 `OrderItem` 是不可变的，它是派生自的类的重要注意事项 。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 包括添加第一项时创建的查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 向添加项后 ，该项的键将被提取一次并保存在查找字典中，以加快搜索速度。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 可以使用 构造函数并指定字典创建阈值来重写此行为。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. > [!NOTE] > 因为 类 `MustInherit` 在 Visual Basic) 中是抽象的 (，所以必须从派生该类才能使用。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在派生类型的构造函数中，调用相应的 构造函数。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 不需要公开功能，如相等比较器或构造函数中的字典创建阈值。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

param.name: comparer

param.name: dictionaryCreationThreshold
param.span: 在不创建查找字典的情况下集合可容纳的元素的数目（0 表示添加第一项时创建查找字典）；或者为 -1，表示指定永远不会创建查找字典。

span.span: The number of elements the collection can hold without creating a lookup dictionary (0 creates the lookup dictionary when the first item is added), or -1 to specify that a lookup dictionary is never created.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该新实例使用指定的相等比较器并在超过指定阈值时创建一个查找字典。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified equality comparer and creates a lookup dictionary when the specified threshold is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 包括添加第一项时创建的查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 向添加项后 ，该项的键将被提取一次并保存在查找字典中，以加快搜索速度。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 此构造函数允许你重写该行为。This constructor allows you to override that behavior. 指定0将在添加第一个元素时创建字典，1则在添加第二个元素时创建字典，依此类推。Specify 0 to create the dictionary when the first element is added, 1 to create the dictionary when the second element is added, and so on. 如果指定-1 作为阈值，则永远不会创建查找字典。If you specify -1 as the threshold, the lookup dictionary is never created. 对于非常小的集合，查找字典提供的检索速度改进可能不值得字典所需的额外内存。For very small collections the improvement in retrieval speed provided by the lookup dictionary might not be worth the extra memory required by the dictionary. 通过设置阈值，您可以决定何时进行权衡。Setting a threshold allows you to decide when to make that tradeoff. > [!NOTE] > 因为 类 `MustInherit` 在 Visual Basic) 中是抽象的 (，所以必须从派生该类才能使用。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在派生类型的构造函数中，调用相应的 构造函数。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 不需要公开功能，如相等比较器或构造函数中的字典创建阈值。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 、、 和 方法，以提供、和方法的自定义行为， 并 (c # 中的索引器 ) 设置默认属性。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是一个名为的通知事件 `Changed` ，它在每个重写的方法的末尾引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例使用 阈值为0的构造函数，以便在第一次将对象添加到集合时创建内部字典。The code example uses the constructor with a threshold of 0, so that the internal dictionary is created the first time an object is added to the collection. 此代码示例创建 `SimpleOrder` 类，该类派生自 并表示一个简单的订单窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订单窗体包含 `OrderItem` 表示排序项的对象。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建了一个 `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` 包含事件信息的类，以及一个用于标识更改类型的枚举。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 此代码示例通过在类的方法中调用派生类的属性和方法，演示了自定义行为 `Main` `Demo` 。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The element to change the key of.
The new key for .

summary.span: 更改与查找字典中指定元素相关联的键。

span.span: Changes the key associated with the specified element in the lookup dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会修改嵌入在中的键 `item` ; 它只是替换查找字典中保存的键。This method does not modify the key embedded in `item`; it simply replaces the key saved in the lookup dictionary. 因此，如果 `newKey` 不同于中嵌入的键 `item` ，则不能 `item` 使用返回的键访问 。Therefore, if `newKey` is different from the key that is embedded in `item`, you cannot access `item` by using the key returned by . 如果没有查找字典，则此方法不执行任何操作 。This method does nothing if the does not have a lookup dictionary. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 键不能为 `null` 。A key cannot be `null`. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 在修改项目中嵌入的键之前，必须调用此方法以更新查找字典中的键。Before modifying the key embedded in an item, you must call this method to update the key in the lookup dictionary. 如果字典创建阈值为-1，则不需要调用此方法。If the dictionary creation threshold is -1, calling this method is not necessary. 不要将方法公开 为派生类的公共方法。Do not expose the method as a public method of a derived class. 此方法误用会使查找字典与项键不同步。Misuse of this method puts the lookup dictionary out of sync with item keys. 例如，如果将键设置为， `null` 然后将其设置为另一个值，则会将一个项的多个键添加到查找字典中。For example, setting the key to `null` and then setting it to another value adds multiple keys for an item to the lookup dictionary. 在内部公开此方法以允许可变项键：当项的键发生更改时，此方法用于更改查找字典中的键。Expose this method internally to allow mutable item keys: When the key for an item changes, this method is used to change the key in the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 方法以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护的 、 、 和 方法以维护密钥和集合的完整性。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建 `MutableKeys` 从派生的集合， 以及 `MutableKey` 类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有可设置的 `Key` 属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 将新键分配给属性后，属性 setter 将调用 `internal` `Friend` 集合的 Visual Basic) 方法中的 (， `ChangeKey` 以测试新的键是否与现有的键冲突。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，并且不会更改属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了保持对象和集合之间的连接 `MutableKey` `MutableKeys` ，并阻止将对象插入两个集合中， `MutableKey` 类在 `internal` `Friend` Visual Basic) "字段中有一个 (`Collection` 。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法维护，这些方法提供了用于在集合中添加和移除项的自定义行为，例如 方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 在将项添加到集合并在移除该项时清除此字段。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ClearItems() cil managed

summary.span: 从 中移除所有元素。

span.span: Removes all elements from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有查找字典，此方法会将其清除，但不会将其删除。If there is a lookup dictionary, this method clears it but does not delete it. 如果元素数已超过字典创建阈值，并且 使用的是查找字典，则它将继续使用查找字典，即使元素数在阈值下也是如此。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供 从泛型类继承的方法的自定义行为 。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the method, inherited from the generic class. 调用此方法的基类实现以清除基础集合并清除查找字典。Call the base class implementation of this method to clear the underlying collection and to clear the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本节包含两个代码示例，这些代码示例演示如何重写 方法以提供从集合中清除所有对象的自定义行为。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for clearing all objects from the collection. 第一个示例添加了一个自定义通知事件，第二个示例为具有可变键的对象集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 、、 和 方法，以提供、和方法的自定义行为， 并 (c # 中的索引器 ) 设置默认属性。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是一个名为的通知事件 `Changed` ，它在每个重写的方法的末尾引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建 `SimpleOrder` 类，该类派生自 并表示一个简单的订单窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订单窗体包含 `OrderItem` 表示排序项的对象。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建了一个 `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` 包含事件信息的类，以及一个用于标识更改类型的枚举。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 此代码示例通过在类的方法中调用派生类的属性和方法，演示了自定义行为 `Main` `Demo` 。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 方法以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护的 、 、 和 方法以维护密钥和集合的完整性。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建 `MutableKeys` 从派生的集合， 以及 `MutableKey` 类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有可设置的 `Key` 属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 将新键分配给属性后，属性 setter 将调用 `internal` `Friend` 集合的 Visual Basic) 方法中的 (， `ChangeKey` 以测试新的键是否与现有的键冲突。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，并且不会更改属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了保持对象和集合之间的连接 `MutableKey` `MutableKeys` ，并阻止将对象插入两个集合中， `MutableKey` 类在 `internal` `Friend` Visual Basic) "字段中有一个 (`Collection` 。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法维护，这些方法提供了用于在集合中添加和移除项的自定义行为，例如 方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 在将项添加到集合并在移除该项时清除此字段。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 具有查找字典， `key` 则用于搜索字典。If the has a lookup dictionary, `key` is used to search the dictionary. 如果没有查找字典，则使用方法提取每个元素的键 ，并与指定键进行比较。If there is no lookup dictionary, the key of each element is extracted using the method and compared with the specified key. 如果具有查找字典，则此方法是 O (1) 操作 ; 否则为 o (`n`) 运算，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(1) operation if the has a lookup dictionary; otherwise it is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此代码示例演示从派生集合类所需的最少代码 ：重写 方法，并提供委托给基类构造函数的公共构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 此代码示例还演示了继承自和类的多个属性和方法 。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是一个非常简单的请求列表，其中 `OrderItem` 每个对象都表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 的键 `OrderItem` 是不可变的，它是派生自的类的重要注意事项 。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 包括添加第一项时创建的查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 向添加项后 ，该项的键将被提取一次并保存在查找字典中，以加快搜索速度。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 可以使用 构造函数并指定字典创建阈值来重写此行为。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 方法以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护的 、 、 和 方法以维护密钥和集合的完整性。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建 `MutableKeys` 从派生的集合， 以及 `MutableKey` 类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有可设置的 `Key` 属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 将新键分配给属性后，属性 setter 将调用 `internal` `Friend` 集合的 Visual Basic) 方法中的 (， `ChangeKey` 以测试新的键是否与现有的键冲突。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，并且不会更改属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了保持对象和集合之间的连接 `MutableKey` `MutableKeys` ，并阻止将对象插入两个集合中， `MutableKey` 类在 `internal` `Friend` Visual Basic) "字段中有一个 (`Collection` 。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法维护，这些方法提供了用于在集合中添加和移除项的自定义行为，例如 方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 在将项添加到集合并在移除该项时清除此字段。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果查找字典中的键不同于中嵌入的键 `item` ，则不能 `item` 使用返回的键访问 。If the key in the lookup dictionary is different from the key that is embedded in `item`, you cannot access `item` by using the key returned by . 您可以实现此方法以便 `null` 为包含没有键的项的集合返回，在这种情况下，只能通过索引来访问项。You can implement this method to return `null` for a collection that contains items without keys, in which case the items can be accessed only by their index. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 必须重写此方法以提供一种方法，以便从字典中的项中提取键。You must override this method to provide the dictionary with a way to extract keys from items in the dictionary. 此方法在内部调用。This method is called internally. 它不是公共的。It is not necessary for it to be public. ## Examples 此代码示例演示从派生集合类所需的最少代码 ：重写 方法，并提供委托给基类构造函数的公共构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 此代码示例还演示了继承自和类的多个属性和方法 。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是一个非常简单的请求列表，其中 `OrderItem` 每个对象都表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 的键 `OrderItem` 是不可变的，它是派生自的类的重要注意事项 。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法，以便为和方法提供自定义的行为，这些行为是 从 泛型类继承的。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the and methods, inherited from the generic class. 调用此方法的基类实现，将项插入到基础集合中并更新查找字典。Call the base class implementation of this method to insert the item into the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本节包含两个代码示例，这些代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以提供用于在集合中添加或插入对象的自定义行为。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for adding or inserting objects into the collection. 第一个示例添加了一个自定义通知事件，第二个示例为具有可变键的对象集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 、、 和 方法，以提供、和方法的自定义行为， 并 (c # 中的索引器 ) 设置默认属性。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是一个名为的通知事件 `Changed` ，它在每个重写的方法的末尾引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建 `SimpleOrder` 类，该类派生自 并表示一个简单的订单窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订单窗体包含 `OrderItem` 表示排序项的对象。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建了一个 `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` 包含事件信息的类，以及一个用于标识更改类型的枚举。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 此代码示例通过在类的方法中调用派生类的属性和方法，演示了自定义行为 `Main` `Demo` 。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 方法以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护的 、 、 和 方法以维护密钥和集合的完整性。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建 `MutableKeys` 从派生的集合， 以及 `MutableKey` 类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有可设置的 `Key` 属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 将新键分配给属性后，属性 setter 将调用 `internal` `Friend` 集合的 Visual Basic) 方法中的 (， `ChangeKey` 以测试新的键是否与现有的键冲突。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，并且不会更改属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了保持对象和集合之间的连接 `MutableKey` `MutableKeys` ，并阻止将对象插入两个集合中， `MutableKey` 类在 `internal` `Friend` Visual Basic) "字段中有一个 (`Collection` 。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法维护，这些方法提供了用于在集合中添加和移除项的自定义行为，例如 方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 在将项添加到集合并在移除该项时清除此字段。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素的功能： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` 在 Visual Basic) 中。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 此属性不同于继承 属性，后者按数值索引获取和设置元素。This property is distinct from the inherited property, which gets and sets elements by numeric index. 但是，如果 `TKey` 的类型为 ，则此属性将掩盖继承的属性。However, if `TKey` is of type , this property masks the inherited property. 在这种情况下，你可以通过将继承的属性强制转换 为其基类型来访问它。In that case, you can access the inherited property by casting the to its base type. 例如， `KeyedCollection` (`KeyedCollection(Of Integer, MyType)` 在 Visual Basic 中， `KeyedCollection` c + +) 可以在 `Collection` Visual Basic 的 `Collection(Of MyType)` `Collection` c + +) 中强制转换为 (。For example, `KeyedCollection` (`KeyedCollection(Of Integer, MyType)` in Visual Basic, `KeyedCollection` in C++) can be cast to `Collection` (`Collection(Of MyType)` in Visual Basic, `Collection` in C++). 如果 具有查找字典， `key` 则用于从字典中检索元素。If the has a lookup dictionary, `key` is used to retrieve the element from the dictionary. 如果没有查找字典，则使用方法提取每个元素的键 ，并与指定键进行比较。If there is no lookup dictionary, the key of each element is extracted using the method and compared with the specified key. C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 实现 为 [默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 如果包含查找字典，则检索此属性的值将是 O (1) 操作 ; 否则，它是 o (`n`) 运算，其中 `n` 是 。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation if the has a lookup dictionary; otherwise it is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此代码示例演示从派生集合类所需的最少代码 ：重写 方法，并提供委托给基类构造函数的公共构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 此代码示例还演示了继承自和类的多个属性和方法 。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. 此代码示例调用 属性，该属性是只读的并且按键进行检索，并且是可 设置的并且按索引进行检索的属性。The code example calls both the property, which is read-only and retrieves by key, and the property, which is settable and retrieves by index. 它演示当派生集合中的对象具有整数键时如何访问后者属性，这与用于索引检索的整数不区分。It shows how to access the latter property when the objects in the derived collection have integer keys, indistinguishable from the integers used for indexed retrieval. `SimpleOrder`类是一个非常简单的请求列表，其中 `OrderItem` 每个对象都表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 的键 `OrderItem` 是不可变的，它是派生自的类的重要注意事项 。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 还将从查找字典中删除元素的键。The key of the element is also removed from the lookup dictionary. 如果元素数已超过字典创建阈值，并且 使用的是查找字典，则它将继续使用查找字典，即使元素数在阈值下也是如此。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. > [!NOTE] > 若要自定义此方法的行为，请重写 方法。To customize the behavior of this method, override the method. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此代码示例演示从派生集合类所需的最少代码 ：重写 方法，并提供委托给基类构造函数的公共构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 此代码示例还演示了继承自和类的多个属性和方法 。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. 该示例演示 从继承的方法 ，该方法将移除具有指定键的项，以及 从继承的和方法 ，分别按对象和索引删除。The example demonstrates method inherited from , which removes the item with a specified key, and also the and methods inherited from , which remove by object and by index respectively. `SimpleOrder`类是一个非常简单的请求列表，其中 `OrderItem` 每个对象都表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 的键 `OrderItem` 是不可变的，它是派生自的类的重要注意事项 。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 还将从查找字典中删除元素的键。The key of the element is also removed from the lookup dictionary. 如果元素数已超过字典创建阈值，并且 使用的是查找字典，则它将继续使用查找字典，即使元素数在阈值下也是如此。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供和方法的自定义行为 ，继承自 泛型类和 方法。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the and methods, inherited from the generic class, and the method. 调用此方法的基类实现，以从基础集合中删除该项并更新查找字典。Call the base class implementation of this method to remove the item from the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本节包含两个代码示例，这些示例演示 如何重写方法以提供从集合中移除对象的自定义行为。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for removing objects from the collection. 第一个示例添加了一个自定义通知事件，第二个示例为具有可变键的对象集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 、、 和 方法，以提供、和方法的自定义行为， 并 (c # 中的索引器 ) 设置默认属性。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是一个名为的通知事件 `Changed` ，它在每个重写的方法的末尾引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建 `SimpleOrder` 类，该类派生自 并表示一个简单的订单窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订单窗体包含 `OrderItem` 表示排序项的对象。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建了一个 `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` 包含事件信息的类，以及一个用于标识更改类型的枚举。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 此代码示例通过在类的方法中调用派生类的属性和方法，演示了自定义行为 `Main` `Demo` 。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 方法以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护的 、 、 和 方法以维护密钥和集合的完整性。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建 `MutableKeys` 从派生的集合， 以及 `MutableKey` 类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有可设置的 `Key` 属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 将新键分配给属性后，属性 setter 将调用 `internal` `Friend` 集合的 Visual Basic) 方法中的 (， `ChangeKey` 以测试新的键是否与现有的键冲突。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，并且不会更改属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了保持对象和集合之间的连接 `MutableKey` `MutableKeys` ，并阻止将对象插入两个集合中， `MutableKey` 类在 `internal` `Friend` Visual Basic) "字段中有一个 (`Collection` 。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法维护，这些方法提供了用于在集合中添加和移除项的自定义行为，例如 方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 在将项添加到集合并在移除该项时清除此字段。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SetItem (int index, TItem item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetItem(int32 index, !TItem item) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetItem (index As Integer, item As TItem)
protected: override void SetItem(int index, TItem item);

param.name: index
param.span: 要替换的项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to be replaced.
The new item.

summary.span: 使用指定项替换指定索引处的项。

span.span: Replaces the item at the specified index with the specified item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查找字典会相应地进行更新。The lookup dictionary is updated accordingly. 也就是说，将从查找字典中删除要替换的项的键，并添加新项的键。That is, the key of the item that is being replaced is removed from the lookup dictionary, and the key of the new item is added. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供自定义的行为，用于设置 从 泛型类继承的属性。Override this method to provide customized behavior for setting the property inherited from the generic class. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会影响属性的行为 ，该属性是只读的。This method does not affect the behavior of the property, which is read-only. 调用此方法的基类实现，以设置基础集合中的项并更新查找字典。Call the base class implementation of this method to set the item in the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本节包含两个代码示例，这些示例演示 如何重写方法以提供设置属性的自定义行为 。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for setting the property. 第一个示例添加了一个自定义通知事件，第二个示例为具有可变键的对象集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 、、 和 方法，以提供、和方法的自定义行为， 并 (c # 中的索引器 ) 设置默认属性。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是一个名为的通知事件 `Changed` ，它在每个重写的方法的末尾引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建 `SimpleOrder` 类，该类派生自 并表示一个简单的订单窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订单窗体包含 `OrderItem` 表示排序项的对象。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建了一个 `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` 包含事件信息的类，以及一个用于标识更改类型的枚举。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 此代码示例通过在类的方法中调用派生类的属性和方法，演示了自定义行为 `Main` `Demo` 。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变键的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护的 方法以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护的 、 、 和 方法以维护密钥和集合的完整性。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建 `MutableKeys` 从派生的集合， 以及 `MutableKey` 类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有可设置的 `Key` 属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 将新键分配给属性后，属性 setter 将调用 `internal` `Friend` 集合的 Visual Basic) 方法中的 (， `ChangeKey` 以测试新的键是否与现有的键冲突。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，并且不会更改属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了保持对象和集合之间的连接 `MutableKey` `MutableKeys` ，并阻止将对象插入两个集合中， `MutableKey` 类在 `internal` `Friend` Visual Basic) "字段中有一个 (`Collection` 。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法维护，这些方法提供了用于在集合中添加和移除项的自定义行为，例如 方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 在将项添加到集合并在移除该项时清除此字段。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed.
